info.name: Amature Cycling Stats V1
info.description:
Amature Cycling Stats API Documentation

The ACS API is wrtten using NextJS and Prisma.

This documentation was created generated as a Postman Collection, and converted to OpenAPI spec using Postman2OpenAPI

response.name: a list of Races
a new Race
a list of all Categories

item.name: a total count of Races and Results

request.description:
/races/totals

Get the total count of races and results for a given time period, grouped by either 'month', 'quarter' or 'year'.

response.name: a total count of Races and Results

item.name: a list of Results for a single Race

response.name: a list of Results for a single Race

query.description: number: limit the number of races returned
number: limit the number of results returned for each race

request.description:
races/results/recent

Get a list of the most recent races with results. You can limit the. number of races or results that are returned. You can also filter by location.

response.name: a list of recent Results

query.description: number: limit the number of races returned
number: limit the number of results returned for each race

item.name: a list of Results for a single Rider

response.name: a list of Results for a single Rider
a single Rider

item.name: a list of Riders by Rank

query.description: number: limit the number of ranings returned

request.description:
/riders/rankings

Get a list of riders by rank. Returns a list of riders who have accumulated the most points within a calendar year in descending order. Defaults to the current calendar year.

response.name: a list of Riders by Rank

query.description: number: limit the number of ranings returned
